title: Bloomberg Markets: Cities Face Deadline to Woo Amazon's HQ2
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cities Face Deadline to Woo Amazon's HQ2
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Natalie Wong\u0010Canadian Tech and Telecom Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing the deadline to submit proposals for Amazon.com Inc.’s second headquarters, dubbed HQ2, has arrived, and about 100 cities are expected to compete for the project.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
